Uses of Interface
org.apache.mina.protocol.ProtocolEncoder

  • Packages that use ProtocolEncoder 
    Package Description
    org.apache.mina.examples.sumup.codec  
    org.apache.mina.protocol
    High-level protocol implementation layer (Protocol layer).
    org.apache.mina.protocol.codec
    Useful ProtocolEncoder and ProtocolDecoder implementations.
    org.apache.mina.protocol.io
    A wrapper for org.apache.mina.io package to support low-level I/O.

    • Uses of ProtocolEncoder in org.apache.mina.examples.sumup.codec

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMessageEncoder
      A MessageEncoder that encodes message header and forwards the encoding of body to a subclass.
      class  AddMessageEncoder
      A MessageEncoder that encodes AddMessage.
      class  ResultMessageEncoder
      A MessageEncoder that encodes ResultMessage.

    • Uses of ProtocolEncoder in org.apache.mina.protocol

      Methods in org.apache.mina.protocol that return ProtocolEncoder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProtocolEncoder ProtocolSession.getEncoder()
      Returns the ProtocolEncoder for this session.
      ProtocolEncoder ProtocolCodecFactory.newEncoder()
      Creates a new instance of ProtocolEncoder which encodes message objects into binary or protocol-specific data.
